strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Nexus Spawn Swarm has an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other Tyranid formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. In addition, all formations are subject to the Hive Mind special rule.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Tyranid Hive Fleet Hydra.

formations.name: Tyrant Swarm
extraUnits: Replace a Hive Tyrant with a Hive Tyrant Shrike: Free
0-1 Hive Tyrant in the army may be replaced with a Swarmlord or a Swarmlord Shrike: 75 points

formations.name: Assault Swarm
extraUnits: 1+ Gaunts, Gargoyles or Bio-Support must be chosen
Replace two Tyranid Warriors with Tyranid Warrior Shrikes: Free
Replace two Tyranid Warriors with Zoanthropes: 25pts

sections.name: Secondary Synapse Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Secondary Synapse Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm.

formations.name: Tervigon Spawn Swarm
formations.units: One Tervigon and two Barbgaunts, two Hormagaunts, or two Termagants
extraUnits: Add one Tervigon and two Barbgaunts, two Hormagaunts, or two Termagants: 100 points

formations.name: Harridan Swarm
extraUnits: Zero to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gargoyles or Bio-Flyers

formations.name: Spawn Nest
extraUnits: One to two Instinctive Swarms chosen from Gaunts, Bio-Artillery, Bio-Support or Nest-Guard

sections.name: Common Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Common Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Genestealer Swarm
extraUnits: Add up to three Genestealers: 25 points each

formations.name: Infiltrator Swarm
extraUnits: Replace four Lictors with four Dimachaerons: Free

sections.name: Rare Independent Swarms
sections.description: Up to one Rare Independent Swarm for each Primary Synapse Swarm. No more than a third of the army.

formations.name: Bio-Titan
extraUnits: Replace the Hierophant with a Hydraphant Bio-Titan: 100 points

sections.name: Swarm Pool
sections.description: Add any number of units that start the game in the swarm pool

formations.name: Gaunt
formations.units: Add two point to the swarm pool

upgrades.title: Instinctive Swarms
upgrades.description: It is compulsory to buy the minimum amount of Instinctive Swarms.

items.name: Bio-Flyers
items.description: Three Harpies or three Hive Crones

items.name: Carnifex
items.description: Two Barbed Carnifex or two Screamer-Killer Carnifex
